title: Ham and veg pasta salad
ingredients: ['450g conchiglie (small shell) pasta', '250g mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons vinegar', '125g caster sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons prepared mustard', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and chopped', '4 tablespoons grated carrots', '450g diced cooked ham']
